dialogues.text: Vaulting the rail, dropping lightly to ground level, weap

dialogues.text: Logan is twenty-five, strong, virile (yet sensitive) with austere grace. He is somewhat manic...proud...as he peers through the nu window  into a kind of foam cocoon which cradles THREE SL INFANTS. Logan is  KNOCKING on the soundless glass.

dialogues.text: Wake up...come on, Logan-6.

dialogues.text: entering . You are here. I  couldn't  believe it when they told me.   What are you doing?

So now you've seen him...what's the difference awake or asleep? Open your eyes once, idiot.   (to Francis)  It's not every  day that a Sandman  son is  born. I'm telling you,  Francis  - that's him!

dialogues.text: Maybe,  maybe not. What's the   difference? Come on,  Logan,  let's get out of  here before  everybody  finds out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: just wondered...what happens? Dunno...flameout maybe. Whatever  happens, you can bet it's final.  But who would want to find out?

dialogues.text: As the maze-car stops, opens and Logan and Francis exit i gathering  CROWD.

dialogues.text: Glittering, crowded. Throngs of people moving on many lev walking, some on moving platforms. It's The Great White W Park --  you name it. Gaudy booths and entrances, featuri delight -- too  much to take in at a glance.

dialogues.speaker: WITH LOGAN AND FRANCIS
dialogues.text: As they thread their way through a crowd which admires th notices them, across halls and up moving platforms, the g argument continuing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: but you don't know, you Just  say what everyone says.  One for  one. One for one."

dialogues.text: Well, why no!? That's exactly how everything works. How else could  the city stay in balance -You have a better idea?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but at least I wonder sometimes --  instead of doing that "one for one" song                  of yours. You sound like a sleepteacher  With a stuck tape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well the minute you get a better idea you can stop wondering. (beat) You know, Logan -- you wonder  a lot. Too much for a Sandman

He mumbl apology and starts  back to RELIVE. As he disappears into the RELIVE SHOP, his friend shrugs to  Logan and Francis and moves on.

dialogues.text: They are moving past a shop called NEW YOU #483 when a ma cannonading out, thrilled and excited. He rushes over to young  woman who has been eying Logan and Francis, plants front of  her with his hands framing his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well? How do you like it? I don't know. The cheeks maybe... look a little -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheeks? Cheeks? Right. Too much,  you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too little? (gestures) Too little. Okay, wait for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he darts back into NEW YOU #483. The woman shrugs, gl around,  smiles and goes off with a passer-by.

dialogues.text: Signs promising LOVE, FULFILLMENT, RARE DELIGHTS. People in and  out. A woman comes out looking glazed, breathing "yes...yes..." As she  passes CAMERA Logan and Francis em the crowd and CAMERA moves  with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you ever see Francis-8? I never even visited Nursery before  tonight.  (beat)  When you wonder, it slows you up -- you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what makes you so curious.  You have any idea who his seed-mother was? Of course not! I m curious, not sick. (laughs)

There is a general air o anticipation  stirring the crowd as CAMERA singles out Lo Francis entering,  waving to friends. CAMERA closes in on as they reach a  beautiful woman who is obviously pleased Francis. They embrace,  and as they break:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and that's my friend, Logan.  (as she acknowledges  the introduction) We're celebrating his next in line. Carousel - Arcade - who knows?  Want to come along? Only if I make it to the top of Carousel. (she holds up her hand) Thirty -- and the big spin.

dialogues.text: In her palm the crystal blinks, red, black. Francis nods, a  half-squeeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're thirty -- already? I always  thought I was older than you -  (beat) Well, give it a good try. You know I always have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's all right. Happy turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll renew. I've got a feeling. So do I...but if I don't at least I'll  have the ultimate thrill. I'd almost  rather have that than renew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel the same way. Sometimes I think  I'm not even going to try and renew when  my time comes. But -- that's three years away. So long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The 2nd Woman walks away. to first Woman)  It's been nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um-huh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: I guess you never had her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You missed something special.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...you can't have them all.

No business scrambling in  Arcade... cuffs Francis' arm) What an old, old man you're getting  to be, Francis. Weren't you ever a  Yellow? I bet you were even wilder  than - (he breaks off as the lights  in the Great Hall dim)  -- come on, Sandman.

dialogues.text: They pause. He puts his hand over hers. Jessica is silent turns his hand over. The crystal blinks red -- on, off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the mirrored archway, looking around carefully, testin they went through somehow. Hands claw at him - he brushes as he searches.

It's narrow here,  you'll have to get behind me. How will they know we're coming? They're watching us now. They'll         let us in when they're sure.

dialogues.text: Close together, he behind, waiting--alert as a VOICE is s heard: filtered)  Sandman, put your hands on your head.  (he does) Clasp your fingers together. Now turn  your hands over. Palms up.  (beat)  In a moment a light will shine in your  eyes. Walk into it--Jessica first,  then you, Sandman. You will have to  stoop--but don't unclasp your hands.  Do you agree?

dialogues.text: Logan nods. Jessica glances back at him but their faces are unreadabl dark. Then suddenly--in front of her--a blindingly bright rectangle of light illuminating them fiercely. Jessica mo forward. Even she has to stoop. Logan is close behind. As awkwardly into the opening, the light goes out.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN, JESSICA
dialogues.text: As he pushes her through the opening then moves instantly side, pulling her with him.. The move fails. Both are pin helplessly in the blinding glare of the spotlight and the appearance of glass-silver spear points pressed against t is unable to draw his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold still, Sandman, or die where you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is she the one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: stage whispers) She betrayed us. Kill him. Kill them both. Jessica you sold us. Sandman butcher. Sandman murderer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica stand rigid against the spear points, o heads turning to the echoing sibilants.. The spotlight go

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the darkness we see the glass-silver spear points are around them, the long shafts falling away into darkness, steaming gently when they touch--making an instant, winci Logan moves--a spear point presses--he flinches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a runner. She brought me here because  I begged her to help me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns his palm. The red crystal blinks impressively in darkness. At the sight, a BABBLE of SOUNDS. Argument.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's lying. No Sandman ever ran.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't run. You kill runners. You have killed runners all your life.        -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I have.                 (beat)         Now it's my turn. And I want to live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another angry murmur of VOICES. Over it Jessica suddenly: What's the matter with you. He's a runner-- he's blinking. We must help anyone who  asks...we must-or we're the same as they  are--deciding who lives and dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the points lifts and touches Jessica's cheek. A qu burn. She shrieks--a tiny sound--and is silent.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: Reacts fiercely, spinning against the spear points, he is pierced in a dozen places as he manages to get Jessica cl shielding her with his body. But the spear points are too subsides, as VOICES rise angrily "Kill him now". Suddenly a RINGING ALARM. All sound stops at once and we CLATTER of FOOTSTEPS down the iron stair and across the o The spotlight bursts on again and a figure staggers into chamber, straightening into the light, hair dishevelled, front against the glare. It's Holly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holly. Holly, New You 483... He's dead.  Doc's dead and the Sandmen came... Holly--Holly. Remember the code. The code, please Holly... They smashed everything and I barely got away. (beat) Holly. Station 12, Sanctuary 7. Holly. Holly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She lowers her hands and we see her, tattered, frightened bright smile strange. She comes to herself a bit, looks t and sees Logan and Jessica, pinned against the wall. She reacts with fear at the sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's him! The first Sandman. He killed...Doc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Holly--wait! He's running. Tell them the rest!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: exhausted) He's the one. You too. I remember. He was in a hurry. Just a face job. Dark hair, I said. Then he killed Doc and you grabbed me--and the machine blew up and I ran...I ran

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holly. Holly! Please...The other Sandman. Remember the one who came after--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holly suddenly remembers and the shock makes her lucid. it out)  That's right. The other one came after.  The older one. Smashing, killing, burning! desperately)  ...and he was hunting the first one,  this one. Wasn't he? Wasn't he? This  one was running, the other one was  hunting him... Yes. Oh yes. (to Logan)  He was after you. I remember. You're  running!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spear points are withdrawn. Logan and Jessica relieve shaken, wary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May we move?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat. Then--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw we pass them through.                         Somebody help Holly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other VOICES mumble agreement. Holly moves off into the d hands reaching out to help her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You two. Just go straight ahead.  Follow the corridors with the pipes  overhead to the end. Then use the key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the voice speaks the spotlight finally goes off and by around the perimeter, we see we're in some kind of large chamber--some part of the vast undercellars of the city. is enough to reveal that there are perhaps twenty people room, reds and greens both--but all are silhouetted, no f There's a kind of aisle open down the room's center and i obviously the way they are to go. Logan and Jessica move pauses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know who you are. I'd like to thank someone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter who we are. Follow  the tunnel to the end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I Will there be someone to tell us where to go from there...?

dialogues.text: Someone will follow. When you come to  the lock, he will tell you how Co go  on the other side. Jessica may go with  you as far as the lock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a deep breath)  No. Jessica goes back now. Take her back.  (suddenly his tone is  urgent as he speaks to her)  Now! Go on back. Back outside, Jessica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She is bewildered by the change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?- No...no...I'm going with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only to the lock. After that  there's no way back.  I don't care. I'm going to Sanctuary.  With you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BABBLE of VOICES. "Impossible"...She ignores, watches L  Will you take me with you?

dialogues.text: Why, Jessica? You're still a green.

dialogues.text: JESSICA shakes her head. She doesn't know why. Logan puts his arm around her, marveling, trying to under moved. But suddenly he remembers the urgency of the momen wheels, pulling her with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on then--they'll be here any minute!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uncomprehending, she starts to run with him. Too late. An shakes the chamber--the wall bellies inward and a group o led by Francis, burst into the room, firing as they come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panic. Turmoil. PEOPLE running, SCREAMING--the ALARM BELL RINGING as Sandmen methodically slaughter the people in t of the room.

dialogues.text: As the brief, one-sided battle rages, echoing SHOTS and S the dust filled room, Logan pulls her down out of the way watch, helplessly. Suddenly the figure of a Sandman looms them. He stares at Logan, unsure. Logan reacts, draws, fi Sandman is smashed away, burning.

dialogues.text: Suddenly aware that he has killed a Sandman. Jessica pull again into the shadow. Neither realizes chat the soft pul crystal can be seen from the room.

dialogues.text: Francis, quartering the room like a hound, searching, sea stopping as he sees 211                FRANCIS P.O.V.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (believing the         blinking crystal is Jessica's)         Logan. I know you're in here.  What've you done...gone crazy over a  Runner? (whispering)  Nobody knows except me. You know I  won't say anything. I should have  turned you in but I couldn't. Leave  her. Come on out with me. It'll look  like you're part of the group that  hit this nest. (pleading)  Logan...you're a Sandman! (slightest beat) Logan...now...now...Logan...

dialogues.text: After the slightest beat, Logan FIRES and Francis falls, chunk of the cave roof falling between him and Logan -- a obscured while EXPLOSIONS and SCREAMS continue.

dialogues.text: As he pulls her shakily to her feet. She nods, she's okay her off down the tunnel.

dialogues.text: SOUND: The same as before as Logan searches his pockets f Runner's ankh. Logan finds it just as the WHIRRING SOUND has STOPPED aga the light has gone out again in the center of the wheel. As Logan and Jessica wait for the sound, etcetera to repe another TREMENDOUS EXPLOSION is heard rocking everything. distance, Jessica can see the shadow of a FIGURE approach As the SOUND, etcetera, repeat-s once more...Logan pushes into the lighted center of the wheel. The ankh fuses and center becomes brighter as the door opens. There is a hesitation...in which Logan turning his head b realizes what he has done and is shaken. As the shadowed FIGURE looms LARGER:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no turning back, is there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan turns and pushes Jessica through the door... follow as the door closes and they are:

dialogues.speaker: ON THE OTHER SIDE
dialogues.text: now, they can still hear the SOUND, etcetera for the last Beyond the lock is the ruins of a vast undersea complex i food was raised and harvested. What we see is an endless labyrinth of breeding pens which stretch off into the gre -- a kind of mammoth aquarium with catwalks and ramps int the huge tanks. The levels are multiple and everything is rusted, rotted and wet. In the tanks themselves are shoals of fish, gardens of se The machinery for harvesting and winnowing has long since rust -- and visible in the great tanks are the wrecks of gear -- the kind of stuff Cousteau and Co. are using now. Footing is dangerous -- a slip from any catwalk means a p water and some of the walkways are well under water anyho invisible ceiling comes a steady dripping and everything and smells of salt and decay and life in the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: 217X1 WITH FRANCIS
dialogues.text: As he arrives at the door, the ankh glowing as before. But Francis has a light. He examines the door with it, an lights the pool of water on the ground, it picks out Jess FRANCIS stoops, gets it and looks from it to the one glow

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Bewildered -- uncertain, as their eyes adjust to the dim Finally, Logan gestures ''this way" and sets out. (NOTE: The action of the sequence is the action of people through a labyrinth. They go along, gripping a rail where sometimes sinking deep into water, sometimes rising above run into blind endings and retrace to the last junction - trying for what looks driest and seems to stretch farthes great wall...)

dialogues.speaker: 219-224 WITH LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: A. Making their way along the walkway side by side. B. Stopping as the walkway disappears under water. Logan while she waits -- until he re-emerges. She follows. C. Choosing between diverging ramps. Having to return.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do we know this is the right way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the only way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: D. POV an alley way full of machinery. Logan gives a whee turn -- great rusty net-combs start to winnow the water. E. Helping Jessica, Logan slips...falls into darkness. Je fear until he emerges, hand over slimy hand. The water is F. POV ancient signs - PROTOPLANK...DEPOT NO #11 DO NOT D HABITAT MARITIME...ETC. They speculate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you suppose this was...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some kind of breeding pens...I suppose...They say people used to breed animal s, fish, anything (at her disbelieving look) To eat, of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ycch. (shudders) To kill things and then eat them. It must have been a savage world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan shrugs, but the idea makes him queasy, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: G. They stop, tired. Peer through at the wreckage of a sm inspection vessel and suddenly hear: SOUND: FOOTSTEPS, coming, halting, WATER sloshing. Steps

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE MAZE OF TANKS
dialogues.text: moving, hunting. Stay here, while I see what it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jessica nods, frightened. Logan slips off into the darkne moment he's back. His face - is grim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Francis, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Trying to move faster now, Logan makes a wrong turning an go back. But as they do so, Francis is ever closer -- a g distorted SHAPE now visible through the eerie glass -then seeming small and distant. As they emerge from the blind alley once again close to t suddenly:

dialogues.speaker: FRANCIS
dialogues.text: looming huge, gun drawn, apparently only a few feet away.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Logan desperately claws at machinery, succeeds in startin somewhere what sounds like a GENERATOR begins laboring, a machinery GROANS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn and run as they HEAR:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: echo; etcetera) LOGAN N N N.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCIS' LIGHT
dialogues.text: is splashing the walls ahead and in it they suddenly see: THE DOOR -- a waterlock with a wheel. As the light passes heaves desperately on it. It starts to give as the light and they are revealed.

dialogues.speaker: ON FRANCIS
dialogues.text: aiming at Logan...then slowly moving his hand until Jessi his sights.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN
dialogues.text: Francis FIRES -- tremendous SOUND, ECHOING and RESOUNDING the great tanks buckles and a cascade of water erupts ove everything. Through it, Logan manages to get the door ope pushes a half-drowning Jessica through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sort of ancient freight elevator which commences to mov when the waterlock door closes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan slumps to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JE
dialogues.text: Moving at an extremely high speed...We can see the outsid flickering - dark, light, - dark, light... and finally to color. They lie slumped, motionless. Finally it stops. Th opens into a kind of glistening darkness, suffused by a b It is now very cold. In the silence Logan stirs. Groping, he touches Jessica, close to him. Logan puts his arm around her and they rise tentatively, he leads her out into the dark chamber where for a moment trying to find themselves. What little light seems to come from the left. Arm around Jessica, Logan st move. I'm afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's brighter there...besides, we can't go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts to move again but Jessica hangs back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He halts. I don't know what's going to happen         to us Logan but --         (a beat) Are you glad you didn't kill him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't make any difference anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're really one of us now, aren't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You knew that I wasn't before, didn't you? (Jessica nods) Why did you stay with me? I wanted to... (Logan puts his arms around her)  ...And you...what made you kill Sandmen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to. I did kill...for the first time in my life I killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you felt like a Runner,  didn't you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess so...I know I felt something  I never felt before...and I didn't  like it...not a bit. (after another long beat)  I'll tell you one thing...Sanctuary  better be worth it. That's the last  place for me to live now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan mouths "Us"...a strange word...and why not... in th minutes he has done strange things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 236x1        INT. - ICE CAVERN Suddenly they are blinded by a brilliant light coming fro and revealing for the first time where they are. 236x2        ANGLE Before them a vase, dim, ice-shrouded storage area, row u row of frozen lockers trailing away into darkness, their contents unreadable in the thick covering of ice and fros side, a bright light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 236x3        LOGAN AND JESSICA Walk toward the light. 236x4        WITH LOGAN AND JESSICA We see a huge, high-domed cavern ringed and ornamented wi extraordinary ice sculptures-They are everywhere: Otters, tusked walrus---overhead a flight of birds. 236x5        ANOTHER ANGLE As they look in wonder:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overwhelming, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica turn and see:

dialogues.speaker: BOX
dialogues.text: Box is half-man...half-metal. From the midpoint of his sternum to his hips he is coils One hand is a cutting tool. His head is half-flesh...half legs are a chrome pedestal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you too startled? Am I too         removed from your ken?         (slightest beat) I'm neither machine nor man...but a perfect fusion of the two...and better than either. (with great pride) No human sculptor could match this greatness...don't you agree?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right - what are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's incredibly beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, but wait for the winds. Then         my birds sing. My walrus breathes.         My palace chimes and bells. And the deep grottoes whisper my name...Box Box...Bahhhhxxxxsss... We're hungry        do you have anything to eat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything to eat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box starts to laugh...He is roaring with laughter as: We're human and we're hungry. I know...I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This place is a link to Sanctuary, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box looks totally confused. How do you think we got here                        !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You walked in. I saw you. Don't you remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan contains his anger. again; quietly)  Where do you think we came from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From? From? From?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were sent here and you know it. Others have been sent here. Where are they? Hiding?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box looks around the cavern:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiding? Yes! Hiding, hiding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do we go?!         (up a notch)                         Where do we go from here                        !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a NOISE outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that the wind? (smiling) Not yet... (slightest beat)  You must hear my birds sing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know about Sanctuary! I know  you do! You have to help us! You  don't have a choice! It isn't your  decision!! Tell us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never a pair. I have never had a pair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you send them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a beautiful pair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never seen humans whom I thought  worthy of being here... (a beat)  I'd like to sculpt you. (looking around)  Where would I put you? (smiling)  I know...you'd be the base of the  column. You'd hold up my world! Answer the question!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know how long all this will  last? Not thirty years...or thirty  thousand years...but thirty thousand  thousand years...and you'll be part  of it. Ages will roll...Ages. And  you'll be here...the two of you...  eternally frozen...frozen...beautiful. There must be somebody else up here.         I can't believe that he's--         his voice tone changing; very lucid) Let me sculpt you and I will show you where the others have gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's better. (slightest beat) How do you want us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nude. Imagine, a pair. take off his clothes;  as Jessica hesitates,  Logan smiles) It'll be all right...

dialogues.speaker: 240-241 JESSICA
dialogues.text: Undresses. Box motions to a pedestal covered with deep white furs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan helps Jessica up to the pedestal. As they stand the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you want us? Up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks at Jessica. Her beauty is glowing in the lamp Logan takes Jessica into his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enchanting. Is that what humans do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By this time, Logan and Jessica are no longer listening t Box...their arms are enveloping one another...with strong

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superb!

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDING BOX
dialogues.text: As his metal hand begins to BUZZ...he brings it to the ba huge column supporting the cavern. As he works furiously...at Incredible speed:

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: ...oblivious to Box...their feelings intensifying as they to hold one another.

dialogues.speaker: ON BOX
dialogues.text: Done...behold...!

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Before they turn to view the sculpture they kiss long and passionately. Their mood is broken by:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done...Done...Done...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica break. They turn and see:

dialogues.speaker: THE ICE SCULPTURE
dialogues.text: Box has captured them perfectly...shimmering with life... emotion.

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDING LOGAN, JESSICA
dialogues.text: There are tears in Jessica's eyes as she reacts to the sc Logan's hand)         It's glorious

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan helps Jessica off the pedestal and they both start

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right. Now you keep your bargain. work)  Wait for the wind! Wait and hear the birds sing over you! in getting out) We're ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box mumbles as he leads Logan and Jessica toward the rear Cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Box enters followed by Logan and Jessica. This room has a fairly low ceiling and it is not too wide It stretches back as far as the eye can see. The ice along the left wall is frosted...but the ice alon wall is perfectly clear. And embedded in the ice along the perfectly clear right w

dialogues.speaker: MEN AND WOMEN
dialogues.text: Standing in erect positions. At first it appears that they might be more of Box's perf of sculpture. But as Logan and Jessica examine them closely through the ice...it is soon apparent that they are real people...who frozen.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Horrified as they move slowly along the wall.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE WALL
dialogues.text: We can see that each of them has a black crystal flower i of their right hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan walks to the end of this wall. Each frozen body has above it. The final body's number is 1056...That number w voice in Sandman's headquarters revealed as the number of Runners. The CAMERA PANS Logan back to Box.

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDING BOX
dialogues.text: As Logan turns toward him. How did they get in here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Regular storage procedure...the same as the other food... The other food stopped coming and they started.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What other food?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fish and plankton, sea greens and protein from the sea. (pointing to the frosted ice wall) It's all here - ready - fresh as harvest day. Fish and plankton,                         sea greens and protein from the sea...And then it stopped coming and they (gesture) came instead. So I store them here. I'm ready. And you're ready. It's my Job - protein, plankton, grass from the sea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan pulls out his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell us how to get out...or IВ№ll         destroy you..I'll kill you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box laughs...The same LOUD, ROARING LAUGH we HEARD earlie Such a beautiful pair. I'll stand you facing one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box starts his saw hand BUZZING.  He turns all the flesh his body away from Logan and starts advancing toward him who is now standing behind Logan. Box is now like an armed vehicle. Logan FIRES...the fire reflecting harmlessly off Box's me Resign yourself.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Retreating...as Logan FIRES again and again...to no avail As Logan and Jessica retreat further and further toward t this room and:

dialogues.speaker: BOX
dialogues.text: Advancing We can SEE PERSON AFTER PERSON...embedded in the clear wa A strange mute audience to this to-the-death drama.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Finally reaching the rear wall of this room as:

dialogues.speaker: BOX
dialogues.text: Relentlessly moving toward them.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Seemingly pinned back against the rear wall. Logan is FIRING his gun futilely with his right hand...wh his empty hand against the rear wall...trying to find a k button which might open it. The entire time he never takes his eyes off:

dialogues.speaker: BOX
dialogues.text: Getting closer. The saw is BUZZING LOUDLY. I make such a small, quick incision ... you can hardly feel it.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Against the rear wall...We can SEE...but they cannot...th them...on the ceiling...there are a number of exposed cab

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box is practically upon them.  As he lunges forward with WHIRRING saw hand Logan pushes Jessica to the floor and d alongside her. Box cannot stop his forward thrust and cuts a sizable chu out of the rear wall as: Logan SHOOTS at Box from the floor Level...upwards ...try penetrate some part of his seemingly impregnable body. He hits the exposed cables on the ceiling. There is an EXPLOSION. screaming)  No! The coils!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box rushes past Logan and Jessica toward the huge ice cav containing his sculptures. All my work!' All my work!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Logan and Jessica stand:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 270x1        ANGLE - THE REFRIGERANT COILS Bursting open, discharging great streams of gases. 270x2        LOGAN Seeing the effect, shooting again and again at the ceilin walls. 270x3        ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coils bursting everywhere, vapor billowing into the caver

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 270x4        ANOTHER ANGLE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huge slabs of ice instantly loosening, crashing over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 270x5        FULL SHOT         AS the effect multiplies--Ln the hissing vapor-sculptures over and enormous chunks of ice loosened and crashing. 270x6        BOX Careening around wildly in the growing ruin, as the light flicker out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ceiling full of birds loosening, crashing down upon B and again like great spears and wedges

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buried in his work, still feebly moving, then still as th ice crashes down, in the terrible darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cowering in the crashing maelstrom of ice blocks--saved o Being in an angle of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SCREEN blotted out by the cave-in, going out of focus Then: SOUND: Ice melting, water running.

dialogues.speaker: 270X11 LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Stir in the dimness, amazed to be alive. SOUND: A heavy crash and splash as another huge ice block the water. As it falls, the cave is suddenly illuminated again. They see the light is coming from a great fissure in the wall- the last ice fall. Water rains across the opening. Logan and Jessica make their way to it, step out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Water is pouring down in a waterfall from the icemelt. They are blinded by:

dialogues.speaker: SUNSHINE
dialogues.text: As Logan and Jessica shield their eyes...then realizing t dazzling light will not go away: Standing together...in fear of the sunrise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there something on fire!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan shakes his head...he doesn't know. As Logan looks up at the sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It seems to be moving away. Come on...

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: clambering cautiously down from the barren ledge.

dialogues.speaker: 274X2 LOWER
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a FAIRLY STRONG WIND starts blowing. What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It feels like breath. It makes  everything move. Your hair is moving. And yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They reach the level below and pause, look around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jessica -- we must be outside!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at him, uncertainly, he puts an arm around her set out again.

dialogues.speaker: FRANCIS
dialogues.text: Picking his way through the ruined cave, puzzled.

dialogues.speaker: EXT .
dialogues.text: As Logan and Jessica reach it. They are startled by the SOUND of BIRDS SINGING for a mom continue through some high grass and thorned bushes being etcetera. A swarm of insects attack...Logan and Jessica fight them I hate outside! I hate it! comforting tone) We'll be all right... (a beat) We will...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is starting to go down...as they see a rabbit dar the grass...startling them for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: 288XA1 FRANCIS
dialogues.text: Coming out through the fissure in the rock, squinting at unexpected light from the sky, then setting out as Logan did.

dialogues.speaker: 288XB1 WITH LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: They come upon bushes of berries. Logan picks a few, look and smells them. As he is about to put them in his mouth. grabs hold of his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sooner or later, we'll have to try something

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan eats the berries...as Jessica watches intently. After a beat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica pick berries and eat. When they are fin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's getting dark and cold.         I'm tired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we rest here? We know we can  eat these.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sit on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Sitting on the ground. Jessica is shivering. Logan has his arms around her tryin her warm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you think that heat-ball went?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think everything's going to turn to ice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I doubt it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't ever let go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a long beat:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It all seemed to make sense until Box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think he was telling the Truth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan shrugs. convince herself)  Maybe we're the first ones to get  through...  (hopeful tone)  Maybe Sanctuary is near, now...  another protected place. It couldn't  be outside. How would anyone know? Even if we find  it -- we can never go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At her stricken look...Logan touches her in a caring way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right...it must be near now. We'll find it. closing her eyes; resting         on his shoulder)         Thirty thousand years didn't last very long, did they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking frightened as he looks up at the moon and the sta drawn. Suddenly, a rabbit darts by. Francis jumps up in great fear and starts FIRING his gun. the rabbit to smithereens. He is breathing hard (fear)...and looking around...gun in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: walking in the hot sun...grimy...thirsty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His face still betrays a wild, frightened look as he move cautiously. He reaches the bushes of berries and sees some of them on ground. He picks a few off the bush...is ravenous...but finally.. frightened that they might be some kind of poison to eat As he angrily crushes the berries in his hand... then wip on his trousers:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing shimmering in the distance. They walk toward it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reaching...

dialogues.speaker: A BROOK
dialogues.text: They rush to it...drink...then undress...swim...and as th in the water:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan!!!Look!! (Logan turns around) No...your palm...look!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan looks at his palm...the blinking crystal is clear. He grabs Jessica's hand and looks at her palm... the same What does it mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: assimilate its meaning himself) The Lifeclocks have no power outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jessica takes Logan's palm and kisses it. You can have any woman in the city. What do you really want? You know, Jessica. ...But I still have the choice...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the answer's Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace there in the water...

dialogues.speaker: SHOOTING DOWN
dialogues.text: Coming out of the forest...climbing up a green hilly area the top and seeing:

dialogues.speaker: WASHINGTON, D.C.
dialogues.text: The monument rising up out of a tangle of forest -- other gleaming, half hidden.  In the foreground Logan and Jessi toward monument.

dialogues.speaker: 301X2 WITH LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Walking toward CAMERA to edge of swamp they stop and look

dialogues.speaker: 301X4 WITH LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Exiting CAMERA RIGHT toward Memorial

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Climbing steps of memorial toward statue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (MATTE COMPOSITE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica walking up steps toward CAMERA.  They p two columns and EXIT CAMERA right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica walk toward statue L-R. They stop and l

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Looking up at statue.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Looking up at statue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have never seen a face like that  before. It must be the look of great  age. Whoever he was he was terribly old. Yes, do you think that's why he looks  so sad---?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan shrugs. They turn, start to EXIT from memorial.

dialogues.speaker: STATUE'S
dialogues.text: (MATTE COMPOSITE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica EXITING.

dialogues.speaker: AND CAPITOL IN B.G., (MATTE COMPOSITE)
dialogues.text: They walk through pond toward capitol.

dialogues.speaker: 301X14 CEMETERY
dialogues.text: (LOT 2)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica walking past gravestones.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: As they pass the stones, Logan glances at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all have names and numbers on them. I wonder what they are?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Beloved Husband". "Beloved Wife". What can all that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then their attention is focused by a distant SOUND a SHOUTING -- a man's voice. Jessica stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan shakes his head. They EXIT cemetery toward capitol.

dialogues.speaker: CAPITOL, (MATTE COMPOSITE)
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica walking up steps toward building.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Walking up the steps...many of which are cracked. They are proceeding with great caution...as they enter th Building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica enter the ancient room. They stop and l

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: SOUND: HAMMERING NOISE -- irregular. It stops after a bit They walk to the door and open it cautiously. They EXIT right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica walking down corridor, left to right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SOUND continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica as Logan opens the aged door.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: React, then they enter Senate and stop and look.

dialogues.speaker: HAIRED MAN OF S SIXTY-PLUS
dialogues.text: There are HUNDREDS OF CATS...and THOUSANDS OF BOOKS all o place. whispering) Look at his face...and his hair...  (grimacing) Is that what it is to grow old? It could be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are a COUPLE OF CATS on the man's lap as he turns a Logan and Jessica...when he HEARS them move closer. The man is stroking the cats calmly...unperturbed by the of Logan and Jessica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How old are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As old as I am I suppose...who knows ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your hair is white.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It wasn't always. I remember when                 it wasn't. But it wasn't your         color either. (looking at Jessica)  ...or yours. I have my color somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those cracks in your face...do they hurt?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could I touch them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my...please try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jessica walks up to the man and touches his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've forgotten. It's been so long since I've used it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica exchange a quick glance...feeling they upon a nutsy, fruitsy cupcake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But all of my cats have names.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what they're called-- cats?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, cats, of course. What else could they be? Cats. Of course each one has his own name too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But there are so many of them. Do you know each one separately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes indeed, everyone. Actually, they all have three. (reciting) "The naming of cats is a difficult matter. It isn't just one of your holiday games. You may think at         first I'm mad as a hatter when I         tell you a cat must have THREE DIFFERENT NAMES." (a beat) An ordinary name and a fancy name. That's two. Do you want to guess what the third one is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica are silent. "But above and beyond there's         still one name left over,         And that is the name that you never will guess; The name that no human research can discover -- - But THE CAT HIMSELF KNOWS, and will never confess." (reaching down and stroking another cat) Will you, my pet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the cats jumps off his lap. "Why did you go little fourpaws? You forgot to shut your big eyes." (the man closes his eyes for a moment; then:) "I have a Gumble Cat in mind!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the man opens his eyes:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long have you been living here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For as long as I can remember.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind of place is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a place, I suppose...who knows?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man looks puzzled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you get here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have always been here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are there any other humans?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gracious...no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have any other people ever passed  through?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man shakes his head...then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But there may be a few around somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What makes you think so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My parents thought so. Mother and  Father. You know? Mother and -- ? You knew your mother  and father?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And...and how were you grown? Inside your mother?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother and Father said so... you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead...they're dead...and buried. what it is) Buried???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan wheels...as he HEARS THE NOISE OF A DOOR SQUEAKING SLIGHTLY...as it opens a bit wider:

dialogues.speaker: A CAT
dialogues.text: Coming through the opening - did he push it?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN
dialogues.text: reciting)  "Gus is the cat at the theatre door.  His name, as I ought to have told  you before, Is really Asparagus.  That's such a fuss To pronounce,  that we usually call him just Gus."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May I see your hand again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Logan and Jessica extend their left hands. The Old Man ta looks from one to another with delight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're beautiful. May I have one too please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No--I'm sorry. It's not possible.  It isn't fair. I'll give you one of my favorite cats...a Jellicle cat. (reciting) "Jellicle cats have cheerful faces, Jellicle cats have bright black eyes; They like to practice their airs and graces And wait for the Jellicle Moon to rise."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry but I don't have anything to  give you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the man continues to look petulant: sincerely) That's the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jessica takes off a ring and hands it to the man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here you can have this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man seems pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind of jewel is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're both full of secrets like Macavity.         (looking at the ring) Did you steal this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reciting) "Macavity, Macavity, there's no one like Macavity, There never was a cat of such deceitfulness and suavity."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's beyond this place - do you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did your Mother or Father ever mention another place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never, never, ever. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a pause:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May we stay here for a while?         We'd like to rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you can stay. This belongs to the people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What belongs to the people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All this. All of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What people?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know...but it does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man stands...and starts walking toward a door to an a room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be right back. (stopping) Oh, yes...about the cats... one rule is true: (reciting) "Don't speak till you are spoken to."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man smiles and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: LOGAN AND JESSICA
dialogues.text: Logan clears two chairs of cats and they sit down. Jessica picks up a book and starts leafing through it. Logan is deep in thought. Jessica looks up from the book. How curious people used to be -- All these books...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence...until:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sweet madman -- how could he Come to exist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He had a mother and father --         and he knew them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
